title: Drawing, "Stage Design of a Prison Interior", mid-18th century
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray-blue washes over black chalk on laid paper, lined
signed: Pen and brown ink at lower left: Miche+lo / Fasano / Fecit
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: View of the interior of a prison court with a winch for a lantern and another for loads

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Stage Design of a Prison Interior", mid-18th century. Pen and brown ink, brush and gray-blue washes over black chalk on laid paper, lined. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-35.
